>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/box/{scope}/file/{file_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Gets a specific file details, metadata and associated
generated files

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"scope","in":"path","description":"Scope the file resides within","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","description":"Valid document box scope string, must be: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, ':', '-', '_', '.'","example":"user:1:files","title":"DocumentBoxScope"}},{"name":"file_id","in":"path","description":"ID of the file to query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"x-tenant-id","in":"header","description":"ID of the tenant you are targeting","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"x-tenant-env","in":"header","description":"Environment of the tenant you are targeting","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

pinned"},"size":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Size of the file in bytes"}},"title":"FileWithExtra"},"generated":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"File generated from the file (thumbnails, pdf, etc)"}},"title":"FileResponse"}}}},"404":{"description":"File not found","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"HTTP error
